Submodules

mixk.engine.hooks.base_hook module

class mixk.engine.hooks.base_hook.HookBase[source]

Bases: object

HookBase is the base class of all hook and is registered in EngineBase class. The subclasses of HookBase implement the following six methods according to needed.

hook.before_train()
for iter in range(start_iter,max_iter):
    hook.before_train_iter()
    train.run_train_iter()
    hook.after_train_iter()
hook.after_epoch()
hook.after_train()
after_train()[source]
